description: This source file demonstrates how to coordinate a team of agents using the MCP protocol for travel planning, including setting up agents, tools, and team instructions.

classes.name: AirbnbListing
classes.description: Data model representing an Airbnb listing with optional details.

classes.name: Attraction
classes.description: Data model representing a travel attraction with optional rating and visit details.

classes.name: WeatherInfo
classes.description: Data model representing weather information including temperature, precipitation, and recommendations.

classes.name: TravelPlan
classes.description: Composite data model for the entire travel plan including listings, attractions, weather, and itinerary.

methods.name: run_team
methods.description: Asynchronous function that sets up environment, creates agents and tools, and runs the travel planning team.
